title: HIRING REMOTE Sr. Data Engineer
description: This role is available to highly qualified remote workers and local South Florida candidates.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description: Note:  We're only looking for candidates in North/South America.  We have capacity for 1 fulltime DevOps engineer, and 3 more for a short 3 month contract.

title: Senior Web Developer
description:
Sabertooth Technologies is looking for an experienced Full Stack Senior Developer in Python to work on a full-time basis from our office based at Nagpur, India
Candidate should be an expert in Python as he/she should be able to architect, develop DB Schema and Restful APIs for our clients based on their custom requirements, by understanding their business objectives. Candidate should be experienced in Python for more than 4 years, of which at least 2 years are into the Django framework and should be able to lead a team of 5-10 developers’ specifications and resolving technical issues. To be successful in this role, you should have extensive experience building web pages from scratch and in-depth knowledge of at least one of the following programming languages: Django, Node.js
Ultimately, you will ensure our web pages are up and running and cover both internal and customer needs.

title: Game Server Engineer Python
description: You could be the new back-end developer working on their new game – a AAA release that came out this year. With a massive online player base, creating and maintaining scalable, reliable, and highly available server code is critical.

title: Senior Python Developer
description: The innovation Lab at Central Square is a new team tasked with prototyping and scaling new, emerging solutions to support the broader Central Square mission of improving communities through our public safety and administration solutions.  As a new team, we are ramping up our engineering efforts with a focus on creating cloud-based data analysis pipelines that use machine learning to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of government agencies.  For instance: How can machine learning make police patrols more efficient and equitable?  How do we craft ML models that are not only accurate but also fair and transparent?  How do we deliver ML services to other teams in a supportable and scalable manner?  If these questions speak to you, then the Labs team is the right environment in which to answer them.

title: Infrastructure Engineer (Primarily Developing in Python)
description: We are seeking an Infrastructure Engineer based in our Waltham, MA.

title: Software Engineer (Automation & Robotics)
description: The vast majority of our operations are powered by our own custom-built infrastructure on a Python/Django/Postgres stack, from ordering to lab processing to billing. We're building new tools, new workflows, and new infrastructure to solve the challenging problems of a technology startup involved with not just bits, but also interconnected physical components like lab robotics and patient samples.
location: South San Francisco, California, United States

title: Software Engineer - Bioinformatics
description: The ideal candidate will enjoy working in a collaborative, multidisciplinary R&D environment as we build innovative solutions for bioinformatics software systems.  They will have a scientific curiosity with eagerness to learn and explore new challenges since their work will enable breakthroughs in genomics.
location: South San Francisco, California, United States

title: Sr Software Engineer - Digital Products
description: The Digital Products team at Myriad Genetics is seeking a talented and dedicated Backend Engineer to develop innovative web applications. We use modern web technologies including: Django, Python, Postgres, Elasticsearch and React.
location: South San Francisco, California, United States

title: Full stack Engineer
description: We are looking for a full stack developer (M/F) to help us develop, test and deploy new and unique features.

title: Junior Software Developer

title: Software Engineer
description: Silverside is hiring a full-time software engineer, to lead a three-year DARPA-funded research project.

title: Python programmer with ClassificationBox knowledge
description: We have a need for the development of an easy frontend program to allow a user to supply multiple folders locally on the device or via a URL, each of which is named for a specific class name for the images in the folder i.e. Cats, Dogs, Birds, then use the ClassificationBox API (Account details will be provided) to TRAIN the model on the folder's images. The resulting model will then be used in a second App (Android) that will allow the user to take a photo with the device's camera, submit the image to the (Trained ClassificationBox) model, and upon returning the classifications of the image, display the Class Name's on the screen along with a bounding box around the resulting class(es) found in the image and the percent of confidence scores for each class identified. The App shall have the ability to have the user input a single class name that will trigger a repeating sound and flashing of the screen when that class is found in the image taken and sent through the model. This will be used as a Demo for a potentially long term project and may lead to more work and opportunities for further development work.

title: *100% Remote* *Python Developer* *EU Only*
description: Are you a developer..?  Do you want to develop products that help hackers do their job?

title: Systems Programmer/Analyst
description:
Position Summary
The position primarily provides programming support for software development needed at Odum. This position also provides IT consultation, support, and training to Odum professional staff and clients using Odum UNIX-based systems. The position consults with clients to identify problem areas with IT applications and services, suggesting and implementing solutions to client needs as part of a team. The position requires workgroup leadership to help design, program and implements open-source tools for Odum’s needs. The position also involves substantial applications programming and design to support deliverables on Odum’s funded grants. The duties and responsibilities of this position are as follows:
Applications programing and systems integration
•       Integrate open source applications to develop data management and computational workflows
•       Program user interfaces using python
•       Lead programmer for CORE2 project
•       Program interfaces to Dataverse platform

title: Python Developer in Test
description: Aerotek's client, a worldwide consumer electronics company, has two teams looking for Python Developers in Test to join their operation full time. This is a great opportunity to get your foot in the door with a worldwide technology company.

title: Senior Full-Stack Python Django Developer
description: A design-minded Full Stack Python / Django Engineer must bring extensive, expert-level experience in Python/Django with the desire to mentor, motivate, and deliver quality code. You'll work on projects that will allow you to wear many hats and flex both technical development and collaborative, communication skills. Your main responsibility will be the development and implementation of huge enterprise websites, responsive ground-breaking platforms, modern e-commerce solutions, snazzy microsites, user-centric custom software, and dazzling digital experiences that change the way companies do business. If you live for taking a concept and figuring out how to bring it to life by building, coding and optimizing, then this is the perfect position for you.

title: Senior Python / SQL Backend Engineer
description:
We need a senior Python/Postgres developer to help us combine the output of our data science team in Oklahoma City and the front end team here in KC. This job is more than coding, it's ownership of a very important part of our stack. This job is essential to the success of the RiskGenius platform.
This role is based out of our headquarters in beautiful Overland Park, Kansas (a suburb of Kansas City).

title: Application Developer (Python & AWS)
description: Our client in Redmond is looking for an Application Developer to join their team to build high-performing, scalable, enterprise-grade applications. You will be involved in all phases of SDLC from formulating the architecture for the requirements, building documentation and presentation around the architecture, writing cloud formation to represent the code and writing the integration tests that are required for testing the code when it passes through CI/CD.

title: Backend Python Developer & AWS Engineer
description: We are currently seeking a Backend Python Developerwith proven experience building Data Pipelines in AWS  using AWS native services.

title: Scientific Developer MRD
description: We are looking for an experienced Python developer with affinity with meteorology, oceanography or other geophysical sciences to join our Research and Development team, who will develop, maintain and support our operational systems which consist of a range of scientific libraries, automated data-production and data-delivery services (mostly Web APIs), together with a group of scientists, software developers and engineers using modern software development technologies such as Docker, Git, CI/CD, Cloud computing, Kubernetes and others. Also, you will have the opportunity to work on the Moana Project, a 5-year nation-wide project to revolutionise the ocean prediction for New Zealand by working on building open data-access portals and backend systems to support the services and products created on this project.

title: Senior Python Software Engineer
description: As a Python developer at SpotOn, you’ll be tasked with building backend infrastructure that powers our web and mobile platform. You’ll utilize both Python 2 and 3, taking advantage of the powerful asynchronous features and other niceties granted by modern Python.We strongly believe in helping each other, asking questions, and welcoming new developers. Being part of a software team should never be a struggle; we are looking for someone who shares that spirit.

description: As a Python developer at SpotOn, you’ll be tasked with building backend infrastructure that powers our web and mobile platform. Are you interested in further optimizing and automating our workflows as well as delivering high-quality software? Then Stylight is your place to be.

title: Operations Engineer
description: As an Operations Engineer, you will fill a key role on our operations team as you work to improve our processes, workflows, and product offerings. You will be responsible for building data pipelines that collect, manipulate, and transport data from multiple sources across our platform. You will gain a deep understanding of clearing processes while building tools that enable Clear Street to be as efficient as possible. You will rely on your ability to collaborate and clearly understand non-technical users and translate their requests into technical execution. In short, you will consistently challenge and improve the way things are done.

title: Data Engineer
description: As a Data Engineer, you will design and implement all aspects of our underlying data analytics infrastructure. You will architect, build, and launch data pipelines along with a processing and research framework. Your systems will be scalable by design. You will develop standards and processes that deliver data with integrity and consistency. You will optimize data structures and algorithms to improve data processing efficiency. In short, you’ll touch every aspect of the system.

title: System Engineer II (DevOps)
description: DealerSocket’s goal is to create an environment where people love to come into work. Guided by the phrase, “do what you love and you’ll never have to work a day in your life,” DealerSocket employees are dedicated to their customers, to each other, and to improving the lives of the community. DealerSocket’s mission is to drive the future of automotive by simplifying the experience for its customers and partners with a suite of seamlessly integrated products. We do this by innovating and creating the best software in the industry. Visit careers.dealersocket.com to learn more about how you can join our winning team!

title: Full Stack Developer (Python)
description: FISC are the creators and originators of trailblazing software in the motor industry used by nearly 2000 motor dealerships in the UK and overseas. As our business continues to grow and our customers put further reliance on FISC systems to drive their own business forward, it is vital that FISC continues to provide the high standard of service that they have come to expect from our dedicated and experienced development and support teams.

title: Python Developer
description: Methode Electronics is seeking a Python Developer responsible for supporting our global Business Intelligence department based in Chicago IL.  In this role, you will deliver end-to-end Business Intelligence solutions from infrastructure through finished product helping build and support our highly scalable and maintainable infrastructure. You will work cross-functionally to create and support local environments; design, build, automate infrastructure and deployment pipelines; and monitor production environments. Ultimately, you will execute and automate operational processes fast, accurately and securely.

title: Python Developer

Platforms initial rollouts have been successful and they are looking to expand. They need top-tier Reference Data developers who have a strong and successful track record of solving hard problems and out of the box thinking. Consultant has to work in a dynamic environment where team members are flexible, self-sufficient; learn the business, the data and the technology stack with minimal supervision and lead the push for horizontally scalable, high performance applications.

title: Backend Software Engineer (SaaS MVP)
description: As Backend Software Engineer, you will be part of a small team working on new capabilities and products that support threat hunting, incident response and intelligence collaboration leveraging open standards. We are working on the next generation of products that embrace open standards and an 'always-on', SaaS-build, CI/CD mindset. From day one we will be working on the MVP.

title: Data Scientist/Sr Python developer
description:
Expert in Python, with knowledge of at least one Python web framework such as Django
•       Able to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system
•       Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture
•       Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
•       Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
•       Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python
•       Must show strong ownership and bias for action
•       Tech expertise to own the best practices in an agile development framework.
•       Substantial experience in building complex and scalable solutions.
•       Solid software development background including design patterns, data structures, test driven development
•       Software development experience in building web services, distributed systems and highly scalable applications
•       Ability to work in a fast-paced environment where continuous innovation is desired.

title: Python Developer £40-60K

description: Tired of not seeing the work you’ve done actually being used? Managed teams whilst remaining hands-on? Like games, have no experience working on them and want to? (don’t worry, they aren’t ‘brogrammers’ either) ?

title: Backend Developer
description: As part of this role you will be primarily responsible for working with a diverse team of top class engineers managing a Python Django backend with a GraphQL API built to power our new Enterprise platform. As part of this role you will be asked to ensure we deliver a platform that is performant and fast for our users. You will also be required to always think about our product with security in mind. It is required that you have strong knowledge in operations and backend technologies to maintain and build out our backend infrastructure to be lightening fast, secure and highly available.

title: HIRING REMOTE Sr. Python Django Engineer
description: As a full-time Senior Backend Engineer, you’ll have an opportunity to focus on development for multiple consumer-facing digital brands that interact with millions of people. You’ll be working with our global engineering team to help push the business forward in critical areas.

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
Here are some projects our team is currently working on
Automatic content moderation. Help improve our event-driven system for recognition of faces in photos, suggestive imagery, and abusive language in profiles. Help influence business decisions and reduce manual workload by making moderation decisions on millions of photos!
Automatic scammer detection. Help us find the bad actors on our dating site. You'll be using creativity and analytics to find new ways to attack this problem. Work with data scientists to implement scammer detection models that can quickly ban these bad actors from our platform. You know your computer science fundamentals.
Performance, performance, performance! Every system has bottlenecks and ours is no different. When you’re dealing with big data, small changes can result in big improvements! Help work on data services, caching layers, database optimizations, async queues, and event pipelines.
Mid-tier services. Build and support systems that authenticate users, empower chats, log internal analytics, send push notifications, and help make match recommendations.
Microservices. We are decomposing large services into smaller pieces so that the company can be more nimble. Help identify and plan areas of the codebase that would be fitting for this migration!
What would qualify you as a good fit for us!

You will rely on your ability to collaborate and clearly understand non-technical users and translate their requests into technical execution. In short, you will consistently challenge and improve the way things are done.

title: Data Engineer
description: As a Data Engineer, you will design and implement all aspects of our underlying data analytics infrastructure. You will architect, build, and launch data pipelines along with a processing and research framework. Your systems will be scalable by design. You will develop standards and processes that deliver data with integrity and consistency. You will optimize data structures and algorithms to improve data processing efficiency. In short, you’ll touch every aspect of the system.

As our business continues to grow and our customers put further reliance on FISC systems to drive their own business forward, it is vital that FISC continues to provide the high standard of service that they have come to expect from our dedicated and experienced development and support teams.

title: Python Engineer

Summary

Comfortable with Linux environment.
Experience with Git.
Should be able to write reusable, testable, and efficient code

Strong unit test and debugging skills.

title: Python programmer with ClassificationBox knowledge
description: We have a need for the development of an easy frontend program to allow a user to supply multiple folders locally on the device or via a URL, each of which is named for a specific class name for the images in the folder i.e. Cats, Dogs, Birds, then use the ClassificationBox API (Account details will be provided) to TRAIN the model on the folder's images. The resulting model will then be used in a second App (Android) that will allow the user to take a photo with the device's camera, submit the image to the (Trained ClassificationBox) model, and upon returning the classifications of the image, display the Class Name's on the screen along with a bounding box around the resulting class(es) found in the image and the percent of confidence scores for each class identified. The App shall have the ability to have the user input a single class name that will trigger a repeating sound and flashing of the screen when that class is found in the image taken and sent through the model. This will be used as a Demo for a potentially long term project and may lead to more work and opportunities for further development work.

We do this by innovating and creating the best software in the industry. Visit careers.dealersocket.com to learn more about how you can join our winning team!

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
Here are some projects our team is currently working on
Automatic content moderation. Help improve our event-driven system for recognition of faces in photos, suggestive imagery, and abusive language in profiles. Help influence business decisions and reduce manual workload by making moderation decisions on millions of photos!
Automatic scammer detection. Help us find the bad actors on our dating site. You'll be using creativity and analytics to find new ways to attack this problem. Work with data scientists to implement scammer detection models that can quickly ban these bad actors from our platform. You know your computer science fundamentals.
Performance, performance, performance! Every system has bottlenecks and ours is no different. When you’re dealing with big data, small changes can result in big improvements! Help work on data services, caching layers, database optimizations, async queues, and event pipelines.
Mid-tier services. Build and support systems that authenticate users, empower chats, log internal analytics, send push notifications, and help make match recommendations.
Microservices. We are decomposing large services into smaller pieces so that the company can be more nimble. Help identify and plan areas of the codebase that would be fitting for this migration!
What would qualify you as a good fit for us!

Also, you will have the opportunity to work on the Moana Project, a 5-year nation-wide project to revolutionise the ocean prediction for New Zealand by working on building open data-access portals and backend systems to support the services and products created on this project.

For instance: How can machine learning make police patrols more efficient and equitable?  How do we craft ML models that are not only accurate but also fair and transparent?
